Squizzy::

She nodded. "I can try to gather that information for you."

She walked up to the CR chamber and pressed a few buttons.  Then she 
walked over to a computer console and began printing up the DNA on 
all the bots that been in that inparticular CR chamber.  She handed 
the information to LadyHawk. "Here you are. Will there be anything 
else?"

She turned around, stopped and turned back to face LadyHawk."I am 
curious, why are you needing all the DNA from the bots here on the 
ship? Would you not find better specimens in the wild?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk got an idea, maybe having an assistant wasn't such a bad 
idea.
> 
> "Say, you wouldn't know how to find CR information for a repaired 
bot would
> you? These systems just aren't up to the standards meant for a bot 
of my
> status." She was hoping that Squizzy could gain the information she 
couldn't
> find.
> 
> "I could make it worth your effort to help me gain the information 
I need."
> Lady Hawk knew that a bot with the information she'd given would 
have to
> fully understand the technology involved. Squizzy did which left two
> options, either take her back to Veratis when she went, or have a 
late
> supper before she went.
